original_text: Now in the first year of Cyrus king of Persia, that the word of the Lord by the mouth of Jeremiah might be fulfilled, the Lord stirred up the spirit of Cyrus king of Persia, that he made a proclamation throughout all his kingdom, and put it also in writing, saying,
korean_text: 바사 왕 고레스 원년에 여호와께서 예레미야의 입을 통하여 하신 말씀을 이루게 하시려고 바사 왕 고레스의 마음을 감동시키시매 그가 온 나라에 공포도 하고 조서도 내려 이르되

sentences.original_text: Now in the first year of Cyrus king of Persia,
that the word of the Lord by the mouth of Jeremiah
the Lord stirred up the spirit of Cyrus
that he made a proclamation throughout all his kingdom,
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 온 왕국에 포고를 내리게 하시고,

sentences.original_text: and put it also in writing, saying,
